column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Brought a client here for dinner and we were not disappointed. We ordered cocktails before dinner and they were mixed wonderfully. Appetizers were delicious
column2: and the Entrees were spot on. Service was a little slow
column3: but they were very busy. The ambiance is great
column4: reminds you of a prohibition style place. I would definitely come back here next time i'm in Chicago.
